moves.1. d4: I miscalculated the situation. I broke my own plan, because I had not seen all its consecuences.
moves.1... d5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bf4 Bf5 4. e3 e6 5: Now is the time to see if he likes tactics. I am doing this move by purpose, and he picked (but I still don't know who is good for, and the game seems to say that I have some bizarre chance.
moves.13. Qxa7: and me too. I must, now.
moves.13... Ne5c6 14. Qa8+: I have to justify my queen's "decoy". I didn't see the weakness of my e3, after e5 (before or after f6).
moves.14... Nb8: The only way to justify such thing is a stunning pawn attack over the queenside. But it takes too long to perform.
moves.15. Nb3: I took the wrong way, here. a4, and pry to come in time to a6.
moves.15... Qc6 16. Nd4 Qb6:
Now I blundered, and moved the knight to b5, thinking that it is nice the a7 check, as if it was all can matter... and I lost. 

But I have a chance. A very slight chance.
